segments.text: I am looking at this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is diligently drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on that task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing dramatically, water cascading over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring onto the cabinet doors and creating a sizable puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot is already submerged in this growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly surprising that she hasn't reacted at all to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly neutral, which I find quite peculiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is clearly on, and the drain is obviously not working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like an impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to finally notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she seems to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am a bit fearful about the damage this water will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR
